author: costin
msg: Now you can use gnumake to compile mod_jk.
We support 2 build methods: ant and gnumake.
We may add .dsp if needed ( I prefer to use ant ).
One thing I want to avoid is having 'special' makefiles for each

author: costin
msg: If jk config is broken, report the error - but don't exit.

author: remm
msg: - isNull wasn't a good way to test the type of the MB (use getType instead).

author: billbarker
msg: Allow the Processor to be set by the server.xml.

This is currently useless, since o.a.c.http11.Http11Processor is the only class that qualifies.  But it allows for future developement of e.g. Ajp13Processor that can re-use this code (at least for initial testing).

author: billbarker
msg: Port the optimized "Host" header parsing from tomcat4.
